title: (x) Melbourne Finance Broking Pty Ltd - Futura {James}
content:
This looks close to alot of fonts but slight variations have ruled many out... IE the way the "C" cuts off straight down and how the "O" is a uniform thickness ETC...   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123812im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69467.jpg)
